creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: white card printed in black; elf figure wearing tall fuzzy black cap with tall pointed brim; large feet and hands; snow-covered pine tree behind elf; printed text inside: "Merry Christmas And a Happy New Year"; signed inside in black ink: "Richard and Anne Holzschuh", and address in blue ink: "5335 Nicollet Ave Minneapolis Minn 55419"
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

URC on back, in pencil: [29b]
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Christmas card with elf
